### Privatjagden

```{r Muffel, echo=FALSE}
x <- c("2020/2021", "2019/2020", "2018/2019", "2017/2018", "2016/2017", "2015/2016", "2014/2015", "2013/2014", "2012/2013")
y <- c(1581, 1226, 1201, 1180, 1250, 1232, 1302, 1095, 941)
dat <- data.frame(Jahr = x, Jagdstrecke = y)
dat

```

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)


ggplot(dat) +
  aes(y = Jagdstrecke,
      x = Jahr) +
  geom_point(shape = 21, size = 2, fill = "lightgreen") 

```

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
boxplot(dat$Jagdstrecke, col="green")


```

### Fiskus

```{r Muffel1, echo=FALSE}
x <- c("2020/2021", "2019/2020", "2018/2019", "2017/2018", "2016/2017", "2015/2016", "2014/2015", "2013/2014", "2012/2013")
y <- c(244, 242, 209, 252, 226, 203, 615, 215, 215)
data <- data.frame(Jahr = x, Strecke = y)
data

```

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)


ggplot(data) +
  aes(y = Strecke,
      x = Jahr) +
  geom_point(shape = 21, size = 2, fill = "blue") 

```

```{r pressure1, echo=FALSE}
boxplot(data$Strecke, col="blue")


```
